description.en:
Pink no Idenshi is a seven-volume one-shot collection with smutty relationships.

Volume 1:[spoiler]
1) Naughty Teacher and Student- High school student Ayase sees her chemistry teacher, Fugiki, (whom she is secretly in love with), kissing a married teacher in the music room. Fugiki catches her watching, and--after she teases him--the two share a kiss. However Fugiki now ignores her! What are Fugiki's real feelings? Will Ayase ever get to be in a real relationship with him?

2)Be Careful After School- Madoka is president of the art committee and a sadistic witch. When newcomer Yuki shows his beautiful and innocent face, she can't resist the urge to torture him a bit before making a move on his body.

3)An Angel's Prank- Asako's friend Miwa is an indiscriminate guy, who is always fooling around with every kind of girl. After a particular bad episode Miwa decides to date Asako (who's not exactly willing). Secretly she's always had feelings for him, but she knows it won't be long before he strays. But her biggest rival is...a dog?!

4)Dangerous Love Triangle- Chijiru has a crush on her classmate Maki, but he won't give her the time of day. When she sees a young boy being molested in the park she defends him, only to find out the "young boy" is Maki's older brother, Nakajou, a devil with an angel's face! Can her love for Maki withstand the pressure of Nakajou's sex appeal?[/spoiler]

Volume 2:[spoiler]
5)Hold Me Baby-Sequel to Kiss me Baby

6)
[/spoiler]
